name: ArkNetwork
description: Ark Network. link an EVM address to an Arweave address. The contract is deterministic, but as part of Ark Network, it becomes non-deterministic where the result depends on the other SmartWeave contracts states. this contract is only for testing purpose.

eventDecorators.name: LaunchContract
eventDecorators.description: Hash to mark updated provenance hash. Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: LinkIdentity
eventDecorators.description: Hash to mark updated provenance hash. Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

eventDecorators.name: PauseState
eventDecorators.description: Hash to mark updated provenance hash. Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.
